summary: After accidentally killing the albino boa of his boss, and in search of money to buy a new one, Dani and his colleagues sign up for the first national competition of Dance Dance Revolution.
cast: Jordi Vilches|Santiago Segura|Bárbara Muñoz|Eduardo García|Chema Rodríguez-Calderón|Oscar Salcedo|José Corbacho|Josele Román|Benito Pocino|Tomás Pozzi|Daniel Cho|Josu Ormaetxe|Lucía Moreno|Enrique Villén|Paco Hidalgo|Paco Catalá|Raúl Teba|Akihiko Serikawa|Pablo Pinedo|Juan Carlos Nieto|Lolo Martín|Chuen Lam|Juan Khun|Nacho Vigalondo|Santi Senso|Antonio de la Torre|Christian Nájera|Velilla Valbuena|Emilio Laguna|Cristina Fungueiriño|Kristina Yvanova|María Iglesias|Adrián Corbacho|Gema Álvaro|Paloma Ruiz de Alba|Erika Quintana|Sara Del Pino|Patricia López|Karen Bonilla|Patricia Montero|Rubén Nsue|Àlex Santaló|Andy Castaño|Carolina Sánchez|Susana Marca|Paula Delgado|Susana Cerro|Estefanía Romero|Vanesa Blue|Ana Porter|Gala Robles|Skizzo Arnedillo|Vanesa Baldonado|Hector Lechon|Paloma Ruiz de Alda
title: La máquina de bailar
